title: Accepted into the Ph.D. program @ID KAIST
summary: I have finally been accepted into the Ph.D. program at ID KAIST and will begin my studies at the DxD Lab.

title: Attended DIS 2025
summary: I presented the paper NoRe: Augmenting Journaling Experience with Generative AI for Music Creation at DIS 2025 in Madeira, Portugal.

title: One paper accepted to DIS 2025
summary: Our paper NoRe: Augmenting Journaling Experience with Generative AI for Music Creation was accepted to DIS 2025.

title: Joined the DxD Lab @ID KAIST
summary: I joined the DxD Lab at ID KAIST as a Master's student.
